scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:config
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && mkdir -p ../dist/public && cp -r dist/* ../dist/public/
scripts.build:server: mkdir -p dist/server && cp -r server/*.js dist/server/ && cp server/package.json dist/server/ && cp -r server/adapters dist/server/
scripts.build:config: mkdir -p dist/config && cp -r config/* dist/config/ && cp package.json dist/ && npm run build:dotenv
scripts.build:dotenv: [ -f .env ] && cp .env dist/ || echo 'No .env file found, skipping'
scripts.build:package: cd dist && npm install --production && cd server && npm install --production
scripts.prod:build: npm run build && npm run build:package
scripts.prod:deploy: npm run prod:build && npm run start:prod
scripts.build:binary:macos: npm run prod:build && pkg . --target node16-macos-x64 --options max_old_space_size=4096 --no-bytecode
scripts.build:binary:linux: npm run prod:build && pkg . --target node16-linux-x64 --options max_old_space_size=4096 --no-bytecode
scripts.build:binary:windows: npm run prod:build && pkg . --target node16-win-x64 --options max_old_space_size=4096 --no-bytecode
